Blog.post: Iâm going to try and actually update this journal as often as possible and not make them really short, dumb entries. Yeah, so anyway this weekend wasnât too shabby. Last night I went to go see Almost Fandango and a few other bands. West Gate was playing too. West Gate is my sisterâs boyfriendâs band. Anthony is the drummer. Anyway, West Gate kicked ass. Almost Fandangoâ¦ theyâre talented and all but I think people make too big of a deal out of them. Theyâre good, donât get me wrong, theyâre not that big of a deal. Not to me anyway. I went with Ryanne, Amy, Zoe, and Danielle. Hector was there too. Great. Yeah, that was sarcasm. Anyway, that was the first show (not just local) that Iâve been to that I was scared to go into the pit. It was... scary. Manâ¦ I wish I could dance like Dusty and those other guys. They were skanking the whole night. They were awesome. Anyway, Ryanne met this guy named David at the show. He seems cool. At like the end of the show they were like holding hands and cuddling and shit. I was likeâ¦ âwow, I wish I had that kind of luck with guysâ¦â haha. I thought Patti (my sister) would come but she didnât. I have no idea why, but Patti has been a bitch lately. Sheâs so snappy about EVERYTHING. Like, Iâll ask her a simple question and sheâll start bitching at me over nothing. My dad and I were talking about how whenever sheâs arguing with someone, she always has the impression that sheâs right. She always thinks that her opinion is the right one. I dunno, Pattiâs cool to hang out with but she needs to chill out. I donât know. I kinda feel bad for Anthony âcause he loves her sooo much but sheâs so strung out and so bitchy all the time. I donât know how he handles it. Poor guyâ¦ Anywho! I helped my mom deliver flowers today for Motherâs Day. My Gramma has worked at Mercerâs Florist sinceâ¦ before I was born. And my sister works there too, and my mom and I help out sometimes so itâs sort of a family thing I guess. Tonight I went to Kasey Bloweâs party. It was pretty cool, a lot of people were there. I went with Beth. I mostly just hung out with Keith, Caroline and Matt, and Beth. Oh, and Alex. Haha. It was coolâ¦ tired me out though. Butâ¦ on Monday my friend Shaun asked me out. Heâs such a sweet guy and heâs so niceâ¦ but I feel horrible because I said yes. I shouldnât feel bad. =\ I feel bad because I said yes when I didnât really have those types of feelings for him. And this guy I talk to on Yahoo (he lives in Canada, yay! Haha) said that the longer I string him along, the more it will hurt him. He said he likes me a lot, but I justâ¦ I dunno. Heâs my buddy so it doesnât really even feel like we go out. God, this sucksâ¦ I dunno what Iâm gonna do. I know that Iâm going to break up with him, but I really donât want to hurt him. Damnâ¦ Well, Iâm exhausted and Iâve had a long day, so Iâm gonna go to bed. Or try to. I guess Iâll just lay in bed and thinkâ¦ at least itâs comfortable there. Night, guys. Love, Cassie
